# 优酷OTT互联网大屏前端技术实践

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian
youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian
youku-ott-hulianwang-daping-qianduan-jishu-shijian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
